home.neo_bank: The open Neo Bank powered by web3 for everyone

home.caaeuro_tech: Ca√¢Euro stablecoin and top notch technology.
home.alt_banner: Girl standing in front of a graffiti wall
home.free_europeans: Free and open for all Europeans
home.blockchain_access: Access via the public Polygon blockchain and the traditional banking system to a euro-type digital stable currency to 445 million consumers and 23 million businesses.
home.secured_by_fr_bank: Collateral secured by a French Bank
home.mnbce: The mainstream digital payment currency complementary and alternative to MNBCE
home.fluctuations: While cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin are popular, they are subject to significant price fluctuations. A euro stablecoin, on the other hand, is designed to maintain a stable value against the euro. This means that Players can make transactions without worrying that the value of their funds will suddenly decrease.
home.predictability: Price fluctuations of traditional cryptocurrencies can create risks for gambling operators and players. By accepting a Euro stablecoin, the risks associated with price variations are minimized, providing greater predictability income and expenses.
home.usage: Using a euro stablecoin can simplify transactions for players and gambling operators. Deposits and withdrawals can be made quickly and easily, without having to worry about currency conversions or complex procedures. This improves user experience and makes cash flow management easier for casino operators.
home.crypto_payment: Cryptocurrency payments, including stablecoins, can generally result in lower transaction fees than traditional payment methods. This can benefit both players and casino operators by reducing payment costs and thus increasing profit margins.
home.world_currency: The Euro is one of the major global currencies. By using a Euro stablecoin, online casinos and gambling sites can attract players from all over the world, regardless of currency differences and exchange rate constraints. This can expand their customer base and drive business growth.
home.privacy_content: As with other cryptocurrencies, using a euro stablecoin can provide a certain level of anonymity for transactions. This may be attractive to players who want to maintain their privacy. Additionally, transactions carried out with a euro stablecoin are generally secured using advanced cryptographic technologies, providing additional protection against fraud and security breaches.
